articles.title: Researchers discover major roadblock in alleviating network congestion - MIT News
articles.description: MIT researchers discovered that congestion control algorithms designed to ensure multiple users sending data over a network do so fairly are actually unable to avoid situations where some users are hogging all the bandwidth.
articles.content:
When users want to send data over the internet faster than the network can handle, congestion can occur the same way traffic congestion snarls the morning commute into a big city.
